comments.html: I remember the first time I watched a switch ONIE boot. The big switch stuff is fantastic. I’m just so over caring how my datacenter fabric works under the hood. All I need is the MAC address of the management port, I enter that in and plug the switch in. Minute or so later I start plugging in servers and move on with my datacenter life lol. Don’t get them wrong, they aren’t going to do your campus/WAN/routing or anything like that, but for a datacenter switching fabric it’s nearly perfect.
